body:
Opening this issue on behalf of @rsdubtso who reported this build error in https://github.com/intel/mkl-dnn/issues/680#issuecomment-608172302

### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
$ spack install intel-mkl
...
==> Error: ProcessError: Command exited with status 4:
    './install.sh' '--silent' 'silent.cfg'

1 error found in build log:
  >> 4    ./install.sh: line 74: cd: /private/var/folders/gz/mvvyvp_97qq2w67m_91x9ptc0000gn/T/rsdubtso/spack-stage/spack-stage-intel-mkl-2020.0.166-g2nrw562bwm2xchfzhqks3ai3grgov
          4e/spack-src/./../Resources/pset: No such file or directory
     5    The IA-32 architecture host installation is no longer supported.
     6    The product cannot be installed on this system.
     7    Please refer to product documentation for more information.
     8
     9    Quitting!

See build log for details:
  /var/folders/gz/mvvyvp_97qq2w67m_91x9ptc0000gn/T/rsdubtso/spack-stage/spack-stage-intel-mkl-2020.0.166-g2nrw562bwm2xchfzhqks3ai3grgov4e/spack-build-out.txt

==> Error: Failed to install intel-mkl due to ChildError: ProcessError: Command exited with status 4:
    './install.sh' '--silent' 'silent.cfg'
1 error found in build log:
  >> 4    ./install.sh: line 74: cd: /private/var/folders/gz/mvvyvp_97qq2w67m_91x9ptc0000gn/T/rsdubtso/spack-stage/spack-stage-intel-mkl-2020.0.166-g2nrw562bwm2xchfzhqks3ai3grgov
          4e/spack-src/./../Resources/pset: No such file or directory
     5    The IA-32 architecture host installation is no longer supported.
     6    The product cannot be installed on this system.
     7    Please refer to product documentation for more information.
     8
     9    Quitting!
```

### Platform and user environment

macOS 10.15.4, Haswell i5 MBP
```
Darwin mbp-roma.lan 19.4.0 Darwin Kernel Version 19.4.0: Wed Mar  4 22:28:40 PST 2020; root:xnu-6153.101.6~15/RELEASE_X86_64 x86_64 i386 MacBookPro11,1 Darwin
ProductName:	Mac OS X
ProductVersion:	10.15.4
BuildVersion:	19E266
```
title: Installation issue: Intel MKL
